summary: On Christmas Eve, an angel petitions God to send help for Kermit the Frog who has lost all hope after losing the Muppet Theatre.

McGinley|Judy Reyes|Bill Lawrence|Mel Brooks|Brian Henson|Jerry Nelson|Kevin Clash|Alice Dinnean|Allan Trautman|Geoff Redknap|Denise Cheshire|Drew Massey|Adam Behr|Gord Robertson|John Henson|Dawn Lewis|Colin Foo|Yee Jee Tso|Dan Joffre|Jonathan Bruce|Cameron McDonald|Darrell Lee-Izeard|Chantal Strand|Robin Mossley|Dan Payne|Dave 'Squatch' Ward|Julia Arkos|John Kennedy|Jon Stewart|Jack Angel|Marci Dacus|Briana Forbes|Fozzie Bear|Ray Galletti|Conan Graham|Scott Menville|Miss Piggy|Lawrence Trilling|Sisi Wang
title: Los Teleñecos en Navidad
